name: Untitled Codex Game
description:
Nova is a contract expeditioneer for massive pharmaceutical company Norstrom. She is sent to the asteroid APRI-0519 to extract company property. On her mission she gets lost and discovers strange creatures that are most definitely unnaturally deformed.

Uncover the Nostrom secrets which lead to her disappearance by reading her last entries in her company tablet. Last seen on anomoly asteroid APRI-0519.

CREATORS

Sal Fontaine
